action.name: Set text
action.param:
"How to make a proper cup o tea:
You will need * Kettle * Mug * Teaspoon * Teabag * Milk
1. Pick up kettle 2. Turn on tap 3. Fill kettle 4. Put kettle back 5. Turn on kettle 6. Put teabag in mug 7. Put boiled water in mug 8. Remove teabag with spoon 9. Add milk 10. Enjoy!"
